content: With the Gourd equipped, using it will cause your Gourd uses to slowly recover. However, the catch is you only have one use of the Qing-Tian Gourd, so you will have to wait for each charge to recover after use. This makes it entirely unique when compared to everything else in the game.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Qing-Tian_Gourd.md', within the main section titled 'Qing-Tian Gourd'.
The content is as follows:
With the Gourd equipped, using it will cause your Gourd uses to slowly recover. However, the catch is you only have one use of the Qing-Tian Gourd, so you will have to wait for each charge to recover after use. This makes it entirely unique when compared to everything else in the game.
